trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class exposes a public <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event.
You can use the properties of the QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs class to return custom help for a particular control to an accessible client, such as a screen reader.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar as propriedades da classe QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs para devolver ajuda personalizada para um determinado controlo a um cliente acessível, tais como um leitor de ecrã.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event, you must set the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A> properties to appropriate values.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>evento, tem de definir os valores a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A>Propriedades para os valores apropriados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A> property should be a string representation of a numeric Help topic ID.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>propriedade deve ser uma representação de cadeia de um tópico de ajuda numérico ID.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The file containing Help for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ficheiro que contém a ajuda para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string defining what Help to get for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia a definir o que ajudam a obter para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The keyword to associate with the Help request for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave para associar o pedido de ajuda para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Help keyword for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a palavra-chave de ajuda para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Help topic associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that was queried.
trans-unit.target: O tópico de ajuda associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que foi consultado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o nome do ficheiro de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: O nome do ficheiro de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: This name can be in the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: Este nome pode ter o formato C:\path\sample.chm ou /folder/file.htm.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string defining what Help to get for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia a definir o que ajudam a obter para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Help to retrieve for the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: A ajuda para obter o objeto acessível.
